text:
@JoeBiden President Trump didn't cause covid19. 
And we will demand you be evaluated by a non partisan doctor. It's very obvious you are suffering from dementia and or altzeimers.  I actually feel sorry for you. Your wife should be arrested for elder abuse.  Take a nap Joe.
